name: Chapel
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The chapel is filled with the soft scent of incense and the gentle flicker of candlelight. The sound of quiet prayers and the soft murmur of religious services creates an atmosphere of reverence and peace. Stained glass windows cast colorful shadows, while the air carries the weight of faith and spiritual significance.
